story_parts.text:
Lion was always a bit of an outsider. He was born different than the other lions - with a mane that was more yellow than red. He was always teased and made fun of because of it. But Lion didn't care. He was content to spend his days lounging in the sun and eating his share of the kill.

One day, Lion was approached by a stranger. The stranger was a man, dressed in all black. He had a briefcase in

next_options.0: The stranger offers Lion a job
next_options.1: The stranger offers to make Lion's mane red

story_parts.text: The stranger offers Lion a job. Lion is hesitant at first, but the stranger is persistent. He says that Lion is perfect for the job and that he will be well-compensated. Lion decides to take the job and follows the stranger into the darkness.

next_options.0: The stranger leads Lion to a dark room and tells him to sit in the corner
next_options.1: The stranger leads Lion to a brightly lit room and tells him to sit in the corner

next_options.0: The woman decides to stay at the house and try to figure out what is going on
next_options.1: The woman decides to leave the house and never come back

quiz_parts.question: What does the stranger say to convince Lion to take the job?

options.0: Lion is perfect for the job

quiz_parts.question: What does the author say about the relationship between the two countries?
